entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
